name: Passenger
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>, Andrew Horton
description:
Phusion Passenger - a.k.a. mod_rails or mod_rack - makes deployment of Ruby web applications, such as those built on the revolutionary Ruby on Rails web framework, a breeze. It follows the usual Ruby on Rails conventions, such as "Dont-Repeat-Yourself""
website "http://www.modrails.com/
